data.Name: 3Degrees
data.Tagline: 3Degrees is a provider of carbon offset and renewable energy services and solutions.

data.Name: Wren
data.About: Offset your carbon footprint through a monthly subscription.
data.Tagline: Erase your carbon footprint • Wren helps you live carbon neutral by accounting for and offsetting your CO2 emissions.

data.Name: Verra
data.About: Verra develops and manages standards that help countries, the private sector and civil society achieve their sustainable development and climate action goals.
data.Tagline: Standards for a Sustainable Future

data.Name: The Gold Standard
data.About: Gold Standard was established in 2003 by WWF and other international NGOs to ensure projects that reduced carbon emissions featured the highest levels of environmental integrity and also contributed to sustainable development. With the adoption of the Paris Climate Agreement and the Sustainable Development Goals, we launched a best practice standard for climate and sustainable development interventions, Gold Standard for the Global Goals, to maximise impact, creating value for people around the world and the planet we share.
data.Tagline: Gold Standard for the Global Goals sets the standard for climate and development interventions to quantify, certify and maximise their impact.

data.Name: Terrapass
data.About: Terrapass is a multi-disciplinary team of individuals dedicated to the fight against climate change.  Our mission is to provide the resources necessary for companies and individuals to understand and take responsibility for their climate impact.  We do this in a number of ways.
data.Tagline: Terrapass uses carbon credits to help finance greenhouse gas reduction and renewable energy projects around the US.

data.Name: South Pole
data.About:
South Pole has delivered emissions reductions and renewable energy through more than 700 projects in over 40 countries to hundreds of organisations looking to compensate their carbon footprint, source clean power, and improve people's lives.
Buy carbon credits from the world's largest portfolio of carbon projects to protect the planet and transform lives.
Corporate demand for renewable energy procurement is growing as increasing numbers of investors, current and potential employees, and customers expect brands and businesses to implement substantial sustainability strategies. 

South Pole supports businesses and public bodies to improve their sustainability performance by offering a dynamic portfolio of sustainability consulting services. We combine customised advisory solutions with the ability to implement bold climate action worldwide. 

The South Pole Digital Lab is our centre of excellence where we develop and scale digital solutions for better managing climate and natural resources challenges, as well as program web-based and mobile client applications. 

Corporates, governments and financial industry require dedicated investment opportunities and platforms where stakeholders can exchange solutions for positive impact if we are to achieve the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and limit the global temperature rise.
data.Tagline: Leading global project & climate solutions developer working on #ClimateActionForAll

data.Name: SINAI Technologies
data.Tagline: SINAI develops enterprise software for automating the regulatory burden of managing carbon taxes and climate risk.

data.Name: Plan Vivo
data.About: Plan Vivo is a certification body that administers the Plan Vivo Standard – a tried and tested framework for community land use and forestry projects that strive to make a difference. We certify projects that demonstrate sustainability over the long-term and oversee the projects to ensure they truly benefit people’s livelihoods and sustain vital ecosystems. Plan Vivo is internationally recognised for its focus on ethical and fairly-traded climate services, meaning a greater share of climate finance (60+%) reaches those who most need it.
data.Tagline: The Plan Vivo Standard provides a support framework for smallholders and rural communities, principally in the developing world, to manage their natural resources more sustainably.

data.Name: Plan A
data.About:
Plan A helps companies on their journey to sustainability.

Plan A has built a software that helps your business calculate, monitor and reduce its carbon footprint. Our platform allows you to track your carbon footprint monthly and learn how to reduce it with the support of a custom sustainability action plan, automatically created based on your worst-performing indicators and offset with the support of trusted environmental organisations.
data.Tagline: Get your carbon under control. Measure how you impact. Reduce where you can. Offset what is left.

data.Name: Pachama
data.About:
We partner with the most trusted project developers from around the world who are executing reforestation or forest conservation projects verified following strict protocols.
We develop machine learning algorithms that analyze satellite images of forests to provide accurate estimations of carbon storage and capture to provide additional verification.
We give you access to a monitoring dashboard to gain visibility on the progress of the projects ensuring accountability and transparency.
data.Tagline: Restoring the forests to solve climate change.

data.Name: Offset Earth
data.About:
At Offset Earth we invest your money into projects that remove more greenhouse gasses than your own carbon footprint puts in.

Each month we pick the best CO2 reduction projects with Gold Standard certification, so you can trust your money is going to the highest rated projects and making the most impact possible.
data.Tagline: Offset Earth is a subscription service to help you lower your impact on the climate 🌱

data.Name: Offsetra
data.About: We fund high-impact, certified carbon reduction projects. These projects need your support to do stuff like reforestation, forest protection, renewable energy installation, and more.
data.Tagline: Only 2% of the carbon market is driven by consumers. Let's change that together - live carbon neutral.

data.Name: Not My Fault Earth
data.About:
Calculate and offset your CO2 emissions.
Reduce your waste, transition to a sustainable life.

data.Name: Nori
data.About: Help drive climate change into reverse by buying Nori carbon removals, and claim your certificate for carbon dioxide removed from the atmosphere.
data.Tagline: Nori is a carbon removal marketplace based in Seattle, Washington.

data.Name: Joro
data.About:
Automatically track your carbon footprint based on what you buy by connecting your credit or debit cards. 

Get a personal climate action plan. Build sustainable habits to improve your footprint and buy carbon offsets to compensate for the rest. 

Follow friends and join groups to see your impact multiply.
data.Tagline: Climate action for everyone

data.Name: GoClimateNeutral
data.About: GoClimateNeutral was created in 2017 with the sole purpose of making it easier to live a climate neutral life and thereby slow down climate change.
data.Tagline: We support UN certified climate offset projects and highlight easy ways to reduce your climate footprint.

data.Name: Frost Methane Labs
data.About:
We are fighting runaway climate change by flaring concentrated releases of methane, a potent greenhouse gas. We do this because we believe that urgent action is needed to preserve both our planet's biodiversity and our most sensitive communities.

Frost Methane exists to identify, flare, and monitor concentrated methane seeps in Arctic permafrost and around the world. This approach has the potential to offset 1% of global human emissions, adding to the scientific dataset of methane release in the process. We earn revenue through carbon offset markets, which we re-invest into future deployments, building a global network of self-sustaining devices to combat climate change.
data.Tagline: Fighting runaway climate change

data.Name: Ecosia
data.About:
Search engine that plants trees using
 ad revenue
data.Tagline: The search engine that plants trees. Over 60 million planted so far, across biodiversity hotspots all over the world.

data.Name: EcoSecurities
data.About:
EcoSecurities is a veteran in carbon markets and greenhouse gas (GHG) mitigation projects worldwide. EcoSecurities specialises in sourcing, developing and financing projects with a positive environmental impact.

Founded in 1997, EcoSecurities grew to become the largest and most influential company in this sector. Today, EcoSecurities has reactivated its project pipeline, contracts book, and alumni network, to participate in a new phase of carbon and environmental markets.

In addition to carbon and climate, EcoSecurities also plans to be active in waste recovery and recycling, to help tackle the increasing challenge related to waste plastics and other pollutants.
data.Tagline: EcoSecurities specialises in sourcing, developing and financing projects with a positive environmental impact.

data.Name: Compensate
data.About:
Compensate's purpose is to prevent climate change and reduce the amount of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere. The foundation uses the compensation payments in full to purchasing emissions reduction units. Compensate foundation owns 100% of Compensate non-profit operations Ltd which is responsible for the daily operations of the foundation.

The activities of the foundation or the limited liability company are not financed with the compensation payments. As our operations grow, we will charge a license fee from our partner companies which helps to secure the activities of the foundation.
data.Tagline: Nonprofit on a mission to combat climate change by offering people ways to offset the emissions of everyday life.

data.Name: Climeworks
data.About: Climeworks captures CO2 from air with the world’s first commercial carbon removal technology. Our direct air capture plants remove CO2 from the atmosphere to supply to customers and to unlock a negative emissions future.
data.Tagline: We stop climate change from reaching dangerous levels by removing CO2 from the air and storing it underground.

data.Name: Climate Neutral
data.About: Climate Neutral is an independent non-profit organization working to accelerate the transition to a low-carbon world by putting a price on carbon emissions.
data.Tagline: Climate Neutral helps companies clean up their carbon by measuring, reducing, and offsetting their entire footprint.

data.Name: Climate Care
data.About:
With over 150 years’ collective experience in the global carbon markets and climate change sector, we make a real difference for the world. We helped shape the first voluntary carbon markets, and pioneered the use of carbon finance for community-based development projects.

In 2007, we achieved our first 1 million tonnes of CO2 reductions, and were acquired by investment bank J.P. Morgan the following year. In 2011, ClimateCare bought the business back. Since then, we’ve deployed over $100 million, working with our partners to create positive social and environmental outcomes.

data.Name: Clearloop
data.About: Clearloop works with companies to offset their irreducible carbon footprint with new solar projects in the United States. With Clearloop, companies get to reclaim their carbon footprint and expand access to clean energy by building new solar projects in American communities otherwise getting left behind.
data.Tagline: Turning every day purchases into clean energy

data.Name: Cascadia Carbon
data.About: Our app quantifies the carbon saved whenever you bike, walk, or take mass transportation. It then generates algorithmically-validated carbon offsets, tokenizes the data, and stores it on a secure blockchain.
data.Tagline: An automated personal transportation carbon emissions calculator app

data.Name: Carbon Zero
data.About: Helping organizations & individuals measure, manage & mitigate their climate impact.
data.Tagline: Carbonzero helps transform organizations by aiding them in assessing, reporting, and reducing their emissions.

data.Name: Carbon Trade eXchange
data.About: Carbon Trade Exchange is the World’s first electronic Exchange for trading voluntary carbon credits (or offsets).
data.Tagline: The World's First Electronic Exchange for Voluntary Carbon Credits - Transparent, wholesale access to Carbon Markets

data.Name: bezero
data.Tagline: bezero makes an impact & offers a solution to avoid, reduce & compensate CO2 now.
